name: Button RPG
description:
Enter a world in which every day brings forth potential situations in which, we as humans, must react to with the utmost caution. Do we lean towards justice and help people out? Or do we become complacent and let things be as they are without giving much thought?

     

Level up your character's stats based on the good or bad decisions you make!

Enjoy hand-crafted pixel art from BurterButterBeans Studio.

The game is in early development. Your feedback would help motivate me to create content and improve the existing concept.

Goals:

1. Add more animations for the outcomes of situations

2. Add a quest system that starts randomly at the beginning of each playthrough

3. Add a personality test that examines your decisions and categorizes you once you beat the game

4. Try to make the game somewhat rogue-like :)

5. Provide a humorous, entertaining and fun experience for you all.

Notes:

  • Update 1/30/2020 @7:23pm Android demo available. Download .apk. Donations welcomed!😊
  • Please stay tuned for a full Google Play release. (You can run the game on Android in your browser and click full screen for the best performance!)
  • This game will be available as a Standalone for offline use once more content has been added and bugs are fixed.
  • This can be played on a Laptop/Desktop/Android browser. There is currently NO SUPPORT for iOS devices. Sorry.
  • Currently where it stands, the following have animations for all outcomes:

"A dog appears before you. He looks hungry, weak, and thirsty."

"An elderly lady has tripped and fallen. She cannot get up."

"There is a fire in the forest quickly spreading."

The following situation:

"A huge goblin appears before you."

has only 1 button that can be clicked for now: "FIGHT" and in there, only "Sword Slash" and "Red Potion" can be used, but are fully playable and can win the fight. Conditions for player dying have not been implemented yet. Will be sure to do so within the next few days.
